# init(device:)

**Initializer**

Initializes a new kernel object.

## Declaration

```swift
init(device: any MTLDevice)
```

## Parameters

- **device**: The Metal device on which the kernel will be used.

## Return Value

An initialized kernel object.

## Discussion

This method fails if the device is not supported. Query the [doc://com.apple.metalperformanceshaders/documentation/MetalPerformanceShaders/MPSSupportsMTLDevice(_:)] function to determine whether the device is supported.

## Methods

- **copy(with:device:)**: Makes a copy of this kernel object for a new device.
